Title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
Writer: Kevin Eastman (based on characters created by), Peter Laird (based on characters created by), Todd W. Langen
Actors: Paige Turco, David Warner, Michelan Sisti, Leif Tilden
Plot: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last canister of the ooze that created the Turtles, with which Shredder wants to unleash an army of new mutants.
Production: New Line Cinema, Northshore Investments Ltd.
